post:
I won't be needing a few Hetzner servers any more after January. If someone is interested, I'll transfer them. I have 8 of them. The monthly price is mostly EUR ~45/month exkl. VAT. Specs:

- Intel Core i7-3770
- HDD 4x HDD SATA 6,0 TB Enterprise
- RAM 4x RAM 8192 MB DDR3

Please PM me, if interested. Once they're all gone, I'll update the thread here. Transfer will be done end of Jan, +/- a few days if needed.
